long_description: Don't get left out in the cold. The SOL Heavy Duty Emergency Blanket reflects up to 90% of your body heat back to you and provides 40 square feet of coverage while weighing a mere 6.6 oz.. Vacuum-packed polyethylene material is quiet and resists tears better than traditional mylar; material also stretches and easily repairs with duct tape. Blanket provides protection from water and wind. SOL Heavy Duty Emergency Blanket is easy to open and fold and is pocket-size when packed. 5 x 8 ft. dimensions offer plenty of shelter for 1 adult.
